title: 10/05/21 DPS Hour 1 Bruce Arians
itunes:title: 10/05/21 DPS Hour 1 Bruce Arians
description:
Bruce Arians tells Dan that Tom Brady was great in practice the week leading up to playing the Patriots. Coach Bruce says the they preached team all week long. Bruce says football is a team sport.
